person-in-charge-full-name.required: Enter the name of the person in charge
person-in-charge-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
person-in-charge-full-name.minlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters
person-in-charge-full-name.maxlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters

person-in-charge-email-address.required: Enter an email address for the person in charge
